## No Team Invincibility

Removes team invincibility, allowing to hit teammates and yourself, as well as other things like shells targetting, passing TCs and more... Does NOT include point gaining.

<details>
<summary>NTSC-U</summary>

```powerpc
04535050 60000000
04533EE8 60000000
0456AF40 60000000
0456E45C 60000000
0456D804 60000000
0479A42C 60000000
0479A448 60000000
047A15BC 60000000
047A1714 60000000
047D5738 60000000
047D6644 60000000
047D65A8 60000000
047D8630 60000000
047A923C 60000000
047D98F8 60000000
```
</details>
